name: Pandemic!
description:
Pandemic! is a videogame for all audiences that serves to make the population aware of the current situation while having fun.

This videogame combines the genre of resource management with action, since your main objective will be to prevent the citizens from becoming infected while you have to carry out your daily tasks. 

Authors
